articles.title: Dumka killing: POCSO charge added, special court to hear case for speedy disposal
articles.description: A special court will hear the Dumka schoolgirl murder case after the case was transferred from the court of a Special Judicial Magistrate for speedy disposal.

articles.title: Delhi's old liquor policy kicks in today | What changes for tipplers
articles.description: Rebates and schemes, such as ‘buy one, get one’ offered earlier under the Excise Policy 2021-22 will not be available as liquor stores will be opened by government undertakings from Thursday.
